message: Let's start with a fair split. Your turn!
You're being too generous, let's try to get more!
A more balanced split, considering the inflation.
You're still not giving me enough!
I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share, but not at the expense of my own gain.
You're getting desperate, I'm going to take advantage of it!
I'm not getting desperate, but I'm willing to compromise.
You're running out of time, I'm going to take what I can get!
I'm making a last-ditch effort to get a decent share. Take it or leave it.
